"My name is Ultra Megatron, and I am the true leader of the Decepticons, 
this *points to Megatron* is too weak and small to control a circuis 
monkey," Ultra Megatron tells them.


>From: gestalt_menasor@...

>Beastbox ejected out of Drag Strip, "Who he?" He grunted pointing at
>Ultra Megatron.
>
>Megatron turned his attention away from the battle field, and looked
>at this robot. Megatron didnt move, he just stood there and looked.
>
>Motormaster was upset however. "Who the slag are you?" He questioned.
>
